Package neqsim.process.util.report.safety

Class ProcessSafetyReportBuilder

java.lang.Object
neqsim.process.util.report.safety.ProcessSafetyReportBuilder
public class ProcessSafetyReportBuilder extends Object
Builder that collects safety information for a ProcessSystem. The builder aggregates condition monitoring messages, equipment safety margins, relief valve diagnostics and thermodynamic KPIs before serializing the result using the familiar Report utilities.

    • build

      public ProcessSafetyReport build()
      Build the ProcessSafetyReport. The method is thread-safe but will copy internal data to avoid exposing mutable state.
      Returns:
      built report
